child.name: Compressors
child.description: Mayekawa offers a comprehensive range of compressors with models developed in response to the variety of applications.

child.name: Cooling Systems
child.description: Our freezing and refrigeration technology is built on decades of experience in design and installments.

child.name: Heat Pumps
child.description: Mayekawa has been manufacturing large-sized air-conditioning heat pumps since 1971 well in advance of our competitors.

child.name: Freezers
child.description: Mayekawa offers a range of freezers that will achieve the most efficient freezing conditions suitable for your needs..

child.name: Gas Compressors
child.description: Mayekawa's gas compressors' performance and reliability have been proven all around the world, over and over again.

child.name: Food Robotics
child.description: Mayekawa is a pioneer of the robotization for meat processing & has developed different kinds of robots for each process

child.name: Other Equipment
child.description: Mayekawa offers equipment that improves safety, efficiency and saves energy  in f&b and cold storage facilities worldwide
